text: Quiet Bliss () is a 2014 Italian drama film directed by Edoardo Winspeare. The film premiered at the 2014 Berlin International Film Festival.https://www.hurriyetdailynews.com/the-best-of-italian-cinema-in- istanbul--74931 ==References== == External links == * Category:Italian drama films Category:Italian films Category:2014 drama films
